price: چاویان شۆڕ وڕیسوایی دایان دەگرێت، بەڕاستی جاران کە بانگ دەکران بۆ سوژدە و(نەیان دەبرد) کە ساغیش بوون
arabic: خَٰشِعَةً أَبۡصَٰرُهُمۡ تَرۡهَقُهُمۡ ذِلَّةٞۖ وَقَدۡ كَانُواْ يُدۡعَوۡنَ إِلَى ٱلسُّجُودِ وَهُمۡ سَٰلِمُونَ

version.title: Kurdish Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kurdish by Muhammad Saleh Bamuky. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: khāshiʿatan abṣāruhum tarhaquhum dhillatun waqad kānū yud'ʿawna ilā al-sujūdi wahum sālimūna
